page.title: 08Industry,Ravensthorpe.
page.content: Mr.R.D.van Millingen started Torque- meters Ltd in l95l.He had been testing engines of various kinds and felt there was considerable need for improvement in this field.The firm started here as he was living in Ravensthorpe and premises were available.At that time optical torquemeters were used and although they were very accurate and efficient they required a number of skilled men to use them.Now they have moved on to a system that records the information automatically,so improving efficiency and reducing manpower.Firms are supplied world wide,each torque- meter is designed and custom built.l8 people are employed including engineers designers,turners,manufacturers, assembly,testing and office staff.For the future larger premises are the most pressing need and even more modern methods of communication.
